Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Specifies whether to use the high resolution, upscaled loading screens & hints in the game.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Specifies what controller style to use on the loading screens.
Uses the high resolution loading screens & hints.
Uses the original resolution loading screens & hints.
Uses a light-coloured controller on loading screens, matching the game's original Vanilla style.
Uses a dark-coloured controller on loading screens, matching the aesthetic of the default XBOX controller.
